page.title: 17LIFE AT PENPONDS cont'd
page.content: ...For Mr. Trevethan and his family, farming is an enjoyable life; Penponds Farm is an ideal size for 1 man with his family. Mr. Trevethan benefits from employing some of the latest farm techniques as it makes it possible for him to forecast yields reliably and thus keep with the fairly stable prices. He also benefits from the E.E.C. policies which, in general, uplift dairy farmers. Turning his mind to future development, Mr. Trevethan hopes to replace some old buildings in his farm with new cattle housing, and he is closely watching the farming scene for any new improved methods of farming that might help his productivity on the farm.
